resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}/{2}', split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('accountName'), variables('databaseName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('accountName'), variables('databaseName')), '/')[1], variables('containers')[copyIndex()].name)]
dependsOn: [resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/sqlDatabases', split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('accountName'), variables('databaseName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('accountName'), variables('databaseName')), '/')[1])]
